reviewText:
I especially enjoyed Bing Crosby.  Now that's a star with a capital "S"!!!
Out of Africa was breath taking.  So sad humans have to live there.
We should just be allowed to visit.
Great movies very pleased.
Very good
This was a great combination of excellent films, and the price was nearly less than I would have paid for only one of them!
Sometimes hard to understand and to hear.  I'm also not sure that I like 4 movies together -- I really just wanted Out of Africa; next time I'll just buy the movie I am actually looking for!
All's quiet movie is the one I wanted. All are good.  Superb classic movie from the early antiwar sentiment from WWI showing that people don't change and War isn't desirable.  I love it!
Great collection and can't be beat.
enjoyable
I bought this used and it was just perfect!
Nice selection of Oldies. A bargain for movie lovers.
All Quiet on The Western Front was a disappointment but others were great!
Have only watched, "A Beautiful Mind" so far but loved it. Thanks.
Fantastic collection!
my dad (who is 88) asked me to get this one....  Great movies and great memories for him

I was going to buy A Beautiful Mind, but Amazon was temporarily out of the single movie, but had the 4 piece collection of best movies for only about a dollar more than the single.  I had read in the paper that John Nash and his wife had been killed in a taxi accident, and I remembered liking that movie and wanted to see it again.  Russell Crowe did a great job portraying Nash.  I still have not watched Out of Africa.  I didn't care for the original, but i am planning to enjoy the re-run more on the DVD.

This has 4 classic movies. I purchased it for the movies A Beautiful Mind and Out of Africa. I had never seen the other two movies and was very happy with the purchase. All of these came in full screen
Pretty good collection. No media issues.
vero good all 4 movies for see more than one time and enjoy it
Going My Way was the only I had seen at the movies.... All Quiet is still not watched and I will do that soon.  The selection is ok.... but all movies have earned their stripes!!!!!!!!!!!
Was a gift for someone
The transfer quality on these DVDs is very good and each film is on a separate disc.  The selection is a bit odd (Russel Crow meets Der Bingle?), but variety is a good thing.
A wonderful collection of great motion pictures!
Good
A wonder assortment

This isn't really a review, but as I found the product description lacking, I decided to compile this list of helpful information below. I hope this will be useful for prospective buyers to know what they're getting:

OUT OF AFRICA: 1985 - 161 minutes - Director: Sydney Pollack - Starring: Meryl Streep, Robert Redford - Genre: Drama, romance - Plot: In colonial Kenya, a strong-willed baroness falls in love with a free-spirited big game hunter. PG

A BEAUTIFUL MIND: 2001 - 135 minutes - Director: Ron Howard - Starring: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly - Genre: Drama, biography - Plot: The story of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, and his life, love, and mental struggles. PG-13

ALL QUIET ON THE WESTERN FRONT: 1930 - 136 minutes - Director: Lewis Milestone - Starring: Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim - Genre: War, drama - Plot: A young soldier faces the soul-destroying horrors in the trenches of WWI. PG

GOING MY WAY: 1944 - 126 minutes - Director: Leo McCarey- Starring: Bing Crosby, Barry Fitzgerald - Genre: Drama - Plot: A young priest challenges a struggling parish to rise to new levels of understanding. G

Now let's crunch some numbers. This set costs $13.82, and contains 4 films. When we divide to find the value of the individual film you're getting, we find a cost of $3.45 per film, a good deal for this little and diverse set of award-winners. I hope this information is useful to you.
this is a very nice selection of vintage movies that I had never seen before -- at an affordable price.

Bought this for my Mom. She said the sound goes in and out on all the
movies, and All Quiet on the Western Front is so dark that after trying to
watch it for an hour, she just had to turn it off.
my dad loved it n it came in excellent condition. also came before christmas as promised. it is his favorite movie so he loved it thanks

I have only viewed the two above mentioned selections from this collection but they are both wonderful movies.  Out of Africa is a beautifully filmed, great story, While All Quiet is a picture that should be shown in High School history classes.
It is hard to say which one is the better. All of them are great films. Probably my favorite was out of Africa, but it is just a matter of preferences.
All are excellent movies, although I bought it just to get "Out of Africa".  Wanted to compare it with the new one that is out now.
Great Product
A collection of great movies from the past. Perfect for winter weather viewing.
I love Out of Africa.  Haven't watched the others yet.
All excellent movies.

I enjoyed all of these movies.  I had never seen A Beautiful Mind but had heard of it and was glad that I was able to finally watch it.  I won't say it was my favorite movie but I think Russel Crow did a great job of acting in it.
Good movies
Great collection of classic movies!
Great Movies to watch again and  again.  Wonderful Price!
MY WIFE AND I ENJOYED SEEING THE BING CROSBY FLICK. I HADN'T SEE THAT ONE SINCE I WAS A CHILD.
All DVD 's are in great viewing condition thanks a lot
